price: (Antiokfoͻ no) kaa sε: ‘’Yɛhunu sε mo yε mmusuo ma yεn, enti sε moanyae (mo nsεm no ka) a, yεbɛsi mo aboͻ, na yεde asotwee a εyε ya paa a efiri yεn hͻ atwe mo aso.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرۡنَا بِكُمۡۖ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهُواْ لَنَرۡجُمَنَّكُمۡ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū innā taṭayyarnā bikum la-in lam tantahū lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minnā ʿadhābun alīmun
